Package Network.ClientSide

Interface RemoteClientInterface

All Superinterfaces:
GameModelObserver, LivingRoomObserver, PersonalGoalObserver, PlayerObserver, Remote, ShelfObserver
All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteClientImplementation
public interface RemoteClientInterface extends Remote, LivingRoomObserver, ShelfObserver, PlayerObserver, GameModelObserver, PersonalGoalObserver

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onMessage(Message message)
    This method allows the RemoteClient to receive requests through Messages from the RemoteServer
    void
    onUpdateModelChairOwner(TurnView turnView, Player player)
    This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that the chairOwner for this game has been set
    void
    onUpdateModelChat(TurnView turnView, String nickname, String chat, String receiver)
    This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that a Player has written a message in the game chat
    void
    OnUpdateModelCommonGoal(TurnView turnView, CommonGoalType commonGoalType1, CommonGoalType commonGoalType2)
    This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that the CommonGoals of this match have been set and which their CommonGoalTypes are

    This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that a new currPlayer has been set

    This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that the game has started

    This method allows a PersonalGoal to notify the RemoteClient of its Player that its PersonalGoalType has been modified

    This method allows a Player Class to notify the RemoteClients when the point total gets modified

    This method allows the Shelf to notify the RemoteClients when one of its cells is filled with a PlayableItemTile

    This method allows a LivingRoom to notify the RemoteClients that the availability of the PlayableItemTiles in the LivingRoom may have changed

    This method allows the RemoteClient to answer to a ping request from the RemoteServer

  • Method Details

    • onMessage

      void onMessage(Message message) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the RemoteClient to receive requests through Messages from the RemoteServer
      Parameters:
      message - the Message to send to the RemoteClient
      Throws:
      RemoteException - an Exception that notifies an error in the connection * with the RemoteServer

    • OnUpdateModelCommonGoal

      void OnUpdateModelCommonGoal(TurnView turnView, CommonGoalType commonGoalType1, CommonGoalType commonGoalType2) throws RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: GameModelObserver
      This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that the CommonGoals of this match have been set and which their CommonGoalTypes are
      Specified by:
      OnUpdateModelCommonGoal in interface GameModelObserver
      Parameters:
      turnView - the updated version of TurnView which is later sent to the RemoteClients
      commonGoalType1 - the CommonGoalType set for CommonGoal1
      commonGoalType2 - the CommonGoalType set for CommonGoal2
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • onUpdateModelEndGame

      void onUpdateModelEndGame(TurnView turnView, Player player, boolean endGame) throws RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: GameModelObserver
      This method allows the GameModel to notify the RemoteClients that the game has ended
      Specified by:
      onUpdateModelEndGame in interface GameModelObserver
      Parameters:
      turnView - the updated version of TurnView which is later sent to the RemoteClients
      player - the Player which is the currPlayer in the match
      endGame - a Boolean signaling whether the game has ended or not
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

      Specified by:
      onUpdateModelChat in interface GameModelObserver
      Parameters:

    • onUpdatePickedTileFromLivingRoom

      void onUpdatePickedTileFromLivingRoom(TurnView turnView, int x, int y) throws RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: LivingRoomObserver
      This method allows a LivingRoom to notify the RemoteClients that a Player has picked a PlayableItemTile from the LivingRoom
      Specified by:
      onUpdatePickedTileFromLivingRoom in interface LivingRoomObserver
      Parameters:
      turnView - the updated version of TurnView which is later sent to the RemoteClients
      x - the 'x' coordinate of the PlayableItemTile that has been picked from the LivingRoom
      y - the 'y' coordinate of the PlayableItemTile that has been picked from the LivingRoom
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • OnUpdateModelPersonalGoal

      void OnUpdateModelPersonalGoal(TurnView turnView, PersonalGoalType personalGoalType, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: PersonalGoalObserver
      This method allows a PersonalGoal to notify the RemoteClient of its Player that its PersonalGoalType has been modified
      Specified by:
      OnUpdateModelPersonalGoal in interface PersonalGoalObserver
      Parameters:
      turnView - the updated version of TurnView which is later sent to the RemoteClients
      personalGoalType - the PersonalGoalType that has been chosen for the PersonaGoal belonging to the Player
      nickname - the nickname of the Player whose PersonalGoal has been modified
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • onUpdatePuttedTileIntoShelf

      void onUpdatePuttedTileIntoShelf(TurnView turnView, int x, int y, PlayableItemTile Tile) throws RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: ShelfObserver
      This method allows the Shelf to notify the RemoteClients when one of its cells is filled with a PlayableItemTile
      Specified by:
      onUpdatePuttedTileIntoShelf in interface ShelfObserver
      Parameters:
      turnView - the updated version of TurnView which is later sent to the RemoteClients
      x - the 'x' coordinate of the cell in the Shelf where the PlayableItemTile has been put
      y - the 'y' coordinate of the cell in the Shelf where the PlayableItemTile has been put
      Tile - the PlayableItemTile that has been put into the Shelf
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection
